## Types of somatosensation

    + Where am I?  How do I feel?
    + Proprioception
- External (exteroceptive)

    + Head movement (rotation, translation)

    + Hot, cold
    + Pressure
    + Vibration
    + Damage (pain)
- Plus kinesthesia (why?)

- Vanilloid Receptors (VR1, VRL1)
    + Also signal "hot
    + Capsaicin
